message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Could you consider a price closer to that?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I have to make a living. I can do $100, and that's as low as I can go. It's still a great price for a high-quality product like this.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $100 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?
Hi Bob, I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $95 and $100. How about $97.50?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $92.50?

Hi Bob, I can see you're really trying to get the best deal. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $95, but I'll throw in a free accessory that's worth $10. That way, you'll be getting an even better value for your money.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer of the free accessory, but I'm still not sure if I can stretch my budget to $95. Would you be willing to meet me at $90?

Hi Bob, I've already given you a great deal with the accessory, and I'm not willing to go any lower than that. I'm going to have to draw the line at $95. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
